xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/861691-Albion Rose 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Following the arrival of an unwanted guest, a tightly-knit bond between two codependent sisters is put to the test when their idyllic playdate takes a dark turn. ALBION ROSE, directed by first-time director Tiffany Tenille, is a coming-of-age drama with hints of magical realism and dark fairytale elements that paints a delicate, yet emotionally charged portrait of a fanciful young woman desperately cradling the enchantment of her girlhood as she struggles to face the harsh reality that her big sister has outgrown her. Albion Rose
